#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType Hole.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CHole Hole]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Hole (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Description of a hole on a course: Media (photographs, videos, sketches...), notes and/or placemarks.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `name`=xs:string  `number`=golfml:OneToEighteen>
            ( media | note | placemarks )`*` 
  </...>
----
  		      
=== Attributes ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* || *Use* || *Default* || *Fixed* || *Form* ||
|| name ||  Name of hole || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| number ||  Hole number || golfml:OneToEighteen || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| media ||  					Associated media: Picture, video, document, link...				 || golfml:Media ||
|| note ||  					Localised note or comment about the hole.				 || golfml:Note ||
|| placemarks ||  					List of places worth of interest on the hole.				 || golfml:Placemarks ||

----
